UniprotID	Q9UIH9
Accession	Q9UIH9
EntryName	KLF15_HUMAN
ProteinName	Krueppel-like factor 15 (Kidney-enriched krueppel-like factor)
GeneName	KLF15 KKLF
Length	416
Function	Transcriptional regulator that binds to the GA element of the CLCNKA promoter. Binds to the KCNIP2 promoter and regulates KCNIP2 circadian expression in the heart (By similarity). Is a repressor of CCN2 expression, involved in the control of cardiac fibrosis. It is also involved in the control of cardiac hypertrophy acting through the inhibition of MEF2A and GATA4 (By similarity). Involved in podocyte differentiation (By similarity). Inhibits MYOCD activity. Is a negative regulator of TP53 acetylation. Inhibits NF-kappa-B activation through repression of EP300-dependent RELA acetylation.
Subcellular Location	Nucleus
Disorder	0.4619,0.3149,0.3426,0.3631,0.4330,0.4476,0.3249,0.3872,0.3529,0.3740,0.3053,0.2609,0.3087,0.3087,0.3117,0.3087,0.3249,0.2951,0.3426,0.3215,0.2783,0.1914,0.2817,0.2609,0.2002,0.2002,0.2002,0.3426,0.2609,0.3053,0.3215,0.4330,0.5254,0.5211,0.5211,0.4940,0.5665,0.6322,0.6712,0.5296,0.5296,0.4369,0.5296,0.5342,0.5992,0.7163,0.6755,0.7036,0.6322,0.6183,0.4901,0.4685,0.3426,0.2399,0.2503,0.2328,0.2645,0.2064,0.2129,0.1942,0.3215,0.3215,0.4476,0.4725,0.4725,0.3740,0.2918,0.3182,0.2094,0.1791,0.1823,0.2817,0.2988,0.3840,0.4725,0.4051,0.4051,0.3983,0.4652,0.4652,0.4652,0.4409,0.4476,0.4292,0.4087,0.3460,0.4186,0.4619,0.4369,0.5342,0.6183,0.7331,0.6806,0.6322,0.5493,0.5493,0.6712,0.5577,0.5620,0.5533,0.5254,0.5017,0.4831,0.5139,0.4685,0.4619,0.5382,0.5577,0.5854,0.4901,0.3807,0.3215,0.3215,0.3910,0.3249,0.4409,0.3807,0.3566,0.4582,0.4901,0.5211,0.5707,0.5382,0.5992,0.5620,0.6620,0.5665,0.5854,0.5951,0.6043,0.6427,0.8085,0.8828,0.7951,0.7982,0.8942,0.7982,0.8013,0.8162,0.8125,0.7916,0.7415,0.7369,0.8235,0.7982,0.7415,0.6948,0.8125,0.7331,0.7369,0.7547,0.8198,0.8050,0.7799,0.8375,0.8421,0.7505,0.8623,0.8894,0.7881,0.7672,0.7755,0.7250,0.6991,0.6322,0.6322,0.7415,0.7595,0.7250,0.7881,0.7629,0.6620,0.6661,0.6948,0.7036,0.7120,0.6806,0.7672,0.7369,0.7799,0.8713,0.7843,0.7672,0.8596,0.8828,0.9126,0.9151,0.8991,0.8828,0.8872,0.8741,0.8741,0.9211,0.9039,0.8942,0.8942,0.9126,0.9151,0.9151,0.9190,0.9230,0.9269,0.9733,0.9783,0.9744,0.9751,0.9381,0.9488,0.9126,0.8853,0.8313,0.8655,0.7843,0.7916,0.8375,0.7595,0.7881,0.6851,0.6712,0.6806,0.6948,0.6620,0.6531,0.6269,0.5951,0.6227,0.5533,0.6576,0.6531,0.7331,0.8125,0.8530,0.8623,0.9230,0.9211,0.8623,0.9039,0.8375,0.8713,0.8872,0.8198,0.7369,0.6661,0.6755,0.5620,0.5758,0.5493,0.5951,0.5992,0.4685,0.4476,0.3704,0.3392,0.3392,0.3356,0.2752,0.2752,0.2988,0.3494,0.3667,0.3599,0.3529,0.4220,0.4119,0.4256,0.5017,0.4864,0.3983,0.3286,0.3356,0.3494,0.3494,0.4330,0.4330,0.4330,0.3460,0.3774,0.4087,0.3872,0.4119,0.3566,0.3494,0.4087,0.4017,0.4
